title: Cant Improve
body: I have nearly 500 games and I'm still as bad as when I've started if not worse i just seem to not be able to improve and I know I'm to blame and not my team but i feel as if i reached a barrier which i cant pass "bronze v" and i only seem to win when I'm being carried :(

replies.body: try not to die as much, play low skill cap champs, no yasuos or lb's. stick to annies and ashes. instead of mechanical skill, work on game skill. focus on your map awareness, farming, and game knowlege, like cooldowns, power spikes, once again, not dying, or not continuing to die after you start dying. youtube, streams, work as well. dong huap is pretty great too.

Especially not yasuo* After the mass nerfing I hope no one but an experienced yasuo is using him any more, without any mechanical skill he will do nothing but feed any more, atleast before he had a ~15% chance of being useful.

If you do not have adequate rune pages I will understand why you are bad. A champion with a good rune page is far better than a champion with an empty rune page. If you have the necessary rune pages but still can't do well, you need to learn your champions and use good strategies and judgement against your opponents.

I feel I've gained a lot of skill since I started, I kinda know this because my friend forced me to check my reaction time on this website, it was 1.2 NOW IT'S 0.9 and I'm very happy, anyway ile stop bragging but now to advice, try and play champs like Kayle, master yi, lee sin, Warwick those kind of champs that have an equal balance of heals/ lifesteal options they'll ramp you up to the skill required for other champs, but yeh I can highly recommend kayle, she's just op for new players as she Is purly point and click and op, her w heals and improves movement speed her q is a bomb spell that slows and her e is just...  UGH so OP, it makes your attacks become ranged, faster and deal more damage, and its Passive gives massive bonus attack damage in the form of magic damage... wow I typed a lot, anyway yeh WOOPH
